name: 焦名楷
objective: 瞭解程式語言所常用之各種資結構，１.抽象資料類別及運算複雜度之概念，２.靜態結構及其儲存法，３.遞迴、堆疊、前序、中序、後序運算式，４.佇列，５.串列、鏈結串列，６.樹、二元樹、平衡樹、堆積，７.圖形，８.排序，９.搜尋、雜湊。
schedule:
1. Introduction: Data Structure, ADT, Algorithms, and Basic Python
2. Basic Data Structures: Stack, Queues, Lists, and Linked lists
3. Recursion: Basic and Complex Recursion
4. Sorting and Searching: Sorting Algorithm, Searching Algorithm, and Hashing/Map
5. Analysis: Computational Complexity, Big-O Notation
6. Trees and Tree Algorithms: Trees, and Heaps
7. Graphs and Graph Algorithms: Graph, BFS, DFS, Shortest Path
scorePolicy:
Attendance: 15%
Assignments & Labs: 35% 
Midterm Exam: 25%
Final Exam: 25%
materials:
Problem Solving with Algorithms and Data Structures Using Python
http://www.amazon.com/Problem-Solving-Algorithms-Structures-EDITION/dp/1590282574
